T02D3396:58a-1: badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3396:58a-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3396:58a-4: rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3396:58b-0: lte ba'i @58b dbus su gru gsum me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D3396:58b-1: de'i dbus su padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa'o //
T02D3396:58b-2: de'i steng du hr'i ham gnyis 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lta bu gsal bzhin pa'o //
T02D3396:58b-3: de yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan
T02D3396:58b-4: 'das ma rdo rje phag mo chen mo mdog dmar
T02D3396:58b-5: mo phyag gnyis pa g-yas na rdo rje g-yon na
T02D3396:58b-6: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga / yi dags kyi
T02D3396:58b-7: gdan gyi steng du g-yon brkyang bas gnas pa /
T02D3396:58b-8: skra kham pa gyen du 'greng zhing 'bar ba /
T02D3396:58b-9: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D3396:58b-10: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs dang ldan pa /
T02D3396:58b-11: mgo bo'i phreng ba dang me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa /
T02D3396:58b-14: de ltar rang gi sems brtan par byas shing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3396:58b-15: de nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D3396:58b-19: sarba dzva r'a na hr'i:sv'a h'a /
T02D3396:58b-22: mdor bsdus pa'i phag mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3396:58b-23: pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang /
